Question: A preschool for the deaf and hard of hearing in Mysore, India, was originally named after this person by its founder K K.
Hints: This person wrote a total of 12 published books and several articles.
This person was frustrated, at first, because she did not understand that every object had a word uniquely identifying it.
In fact, when Sullivan was trying to teach this person the word for "mug", this person became so frustrated she broke the doll.
